name: The Writings: Ancient Pyramid
description:
You are an archaeologist that just arrived in Egypt to study the chambers of a certain pyramid. 

There are rumors of dangerous traps in this pyramid and strange things happening with people that dare to enter it.

Because your curiosity is greater than your fear, you enter the pyramid without
hesitation. After just two steps in the pyramid, its structure shakes and the only visible exit gets blocked. 

Now you must find a new exit while exploring the mysteries of the pyramid!

----

This Game contains 3 good endings and 4 bad endings. Can you find all of them?
